channel.title: should i buy original hl?
channel.description: i have been wondering if i should buy the original hl1 even though i have the source version i kind of want to feel a nostalgic hl1 feel though

item.title: should i buy original hl?
item.dc:creator: Tinman
item.description:
I swept up Half-Life Anthology over the weekend for $6.50.

I played Half-Life: Source on a friend’s PC, and I like HL Original much more than I do the Source version. It was probably the lack of autosave (which may have been in Source, but it wasn’t set up by default) that boosted my interest in the original, since they aren’t much different.

Read full topic

item.title: should i buy original hl?
item.dc:creator: Dr_icecream
item.description:
So:

Buying Half-Life 1: YES! it’s a milestone in gaming (in my opinion then )

2: Playing BM: YES! It’s a great project, with better graphics than when HL was released, so it’s a must!

3: Viewing BM as the perfect HL1 replacement: NO! It might be exactly the same, maybe with better scenes, better graphics etc… But the atmosphere the game had t that time can’t be replaced. I’ll keep saying this, the graphics made the game what it was, even though they’re like crappy now, if you compare it to HL 2.

Read full topic

item.title: should i buy original hl?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
2 words: goldsource mods

99% of all goldsource mods (I would lay odds that there are at least as many goldsource mods worth playing as there are source mods worth playing) require HL1 and definitely wont work if you only have HL: S. They Hunger, USS Darkstar, Sweet Half Life, Point of View, Decay, and The Trap are some of the most fun mods I’ve played PERIOD. If HL1 is on sale to ANY extent, you should get it.

dang. The deal is already over. I’m sure Valve will come out with some excuse to put HL1 back on sale within the next year though.

Read full topic

item.title: should i buy original hl?
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
If you already have a Source game I’d say get the original. There’s really no point in getting the Source version now that this mod is coming out. Besides it lets you experience it in its original glory.

item.title: should i buy original hl?
item.dc:creator: Zageron
item.description:
I would buy the Source edition though. I don’t know about you all, but playing HL in the source source engine is much better than playing in the original engine. (Just slightly better all around, and much better graphics IMO)
